name: yahoo_finance_bulk_search
description: Search multiple stock symbols on Yahoo Finance in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling yahoo_finance_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const rows = document.querySelectorAll('table tbody tr'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(rows.length, 5); i++) { const row = rows[i]; const cells = row.querySelectorAll('td'); if (cells.length >= 2) { const symbolEl = cells[0] ? cells[0].querySelector('a') || cells[0] : null; const nameEl = cells[1]; const priceEl = cells.length > 2 ? cells[2] : null; const changeEl = cells.length > 3 ? cells[3] : null; const typeEl = cells.length > 4 ? cells[4] : null; results.push({ symbol: symbolEl ? symbolEl.textContent.trim() : '', name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', last_price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', change: changeEl ? changeEl.textContent.trim() : '', type: typeEl ? typeEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: symbolEl && symbolEl.href ? symbolEl.href : '' }); } } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('s') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
